alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 7:36PM EST until January 30 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Southern Worcester MA and Northern Worcester MA Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until midnight EST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
